thread.title: Ground News - Why do public officials keep bending over for Walmart?
thread.title_full: Ground News - Why do public officials keep bending over for Walmart?

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Why do public officials keep bending over for Walmart?
text:
Summary by Ground News I am tired of big corporations agreeing on one thing then coming back later and wanting to change plans. They think because of their size people will cave in and give them what they want. I hope in this situation this is not the case. Do we really need another project like this? Share menu More
